page.description: Get a blob from a bigger blob.
page.syntax: New_Blob as B = peekb(N position,N length)

argument.name: position
argument.description: The byte starting position for the read operation.

argument.name: length
argument.description: The number of bytes to copy.

page.discussion: The .PEEKB() method returns a portion of a second blob variable.
page.example: dim b1 as B dim b2 as B b1 = char_to_blob("AB") b2 = b1.peekb(1, 1) ? b2 = A
